title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read Snapshot

view.title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read
view.subtitle: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

blocks.title: Adversary Cross Biz Read completed
blocks.message: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Anonymous/Sensitive Booking. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.
